Our product portfolio ranges from high-speed trains, metros, monorail, and trams to integrated systems, customised services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility solutions. Joining us means joining a caring, responsible, and innovative company where more than 70,000 people lead the way to greener and smarter mobility, worldwideJob Title
EN-DR-42: Computer Aided Designer (CAD)  - Mechanical Integration
 Purpose of the Job
•    Performing 3D modelling, design annotations & dimensions and metadata.
•    Checking 3D interfaces for external design.
•    Applying applicable Mechanical Domain instructions, processes & tools.
 Position in the Organisation
Organisation Reporting
•    Hierarchical Reporting: (Site) Mechanical Domain Leader (MDL)
•    Functional Reporting: Mechanical Engineer (ME)
Network & Links
•    Engineering: Design team ( DLEs, other ME and CADs, …), Costing Team, Quality Engineering
•    Project: Industrial Lead Engineer (ILE), ILS team
•    Site: Indus Departement, Manufacturing.
•    External Interface :  SubcontractorsMissions
Performance Measurement/KPI’s
•    On-time delivering (Digital Mock-Up maturity)
•    Clash avoidance
•    Respect of Weight allocationResponsibilitiesResponsible for :   
•    Modelizing and storing allocated volumes and interfaces for sub-systems / components in Digital Mock-Up.
•    Performing Detailed Design on internal sub-systems.
•    Performing 3D, design annotations and 2D deliverables in compliance with QCD commitments, Metier rules and processes.
•    Filling-up attributes for each part in Digital Mock-Up (naming, material, Fire & Smoke, etc.)
•    Verifying consistency of digital mock-up (no clash, etc.) and compliance with requirements (allocated volumes, weight, interfaces, etc.) on assigned scope.
•    Preparing and documenting Mechanical Domain Design Reviews according to N+1 instructions.
•    Updating Digital Mock-Up taking into account Change Requests.
•    Checking other CADs' and sub-contractor's Design Quality
•    Realizing stack-up analysis.
•    Realizing Bill of Material.Contributor for:
•    Proposing Design Optimizations (weight, cost, etc.)
•    Supporting Manufacturing teams during Production ramp-up.
•    Collaborating with Mechanical Domain Leader for continuous improvement of the Metier (including RoE).Job Specifications
Knowledge & Experience
•    3D Modelling, drawing rules and stack-up analysis.
•    Structured and organised with Hands-on approach.
•    English basics in read/writing.
Team size
•    N/A•
